Member Function Documentation

virtual void sevent::socket::Listener::listen ( Address_ptr  address) [pure virtual]

Create listening socket and register as accept-handler for this socket.

Returns at once. Client connections (accept) is handled by the worker threads.

Implemented in sevent::asiosocket::AsioListener.
